zh.title: 心火计划
zh.content-welcome-hfp-welcome: 欢迎您来到心火计划官方网站!
zh.content-introduce-main-hfp-joinus-2: 我在心火计划等候您的到来!
zh.content-introduce-right-hfp-what-is-hfp-: 心火计划是一个由 Minecraft 玩家组成的热情社区. 我们的使命是通过翻译和共享, 让每一个 Minecraft 的世界都能被大多数的玩家所理解和享受.
zh.content-introduce-right-hfp-cross-lang-g: 跨越语言的障碍, 共享世界
我们的团队专注于翻译 Minecraft 地图, 我们都致力于让这些世界的故事和环境能被更多的玩家所理解, 让语言不再成为探索新世界的障碍.
zh.content-introduce-right-hfp-create-excel: 创造并分享优质的 Minecraft 体验
在心火计划中, 我们深信创新和创造力是推动我们前进的动力. 我们鼓励每一位成员将他们的想象力注入到 Minecraft 的世界中, 创造出独一无二的地图, 让每个玩家都能体验到不一样的冒险.
zh.content-statistics-members-hepingge-2: 少年当有凌云志, 不负韶华不负卿
zh.content-statistics-members-heimnad-2: Let go of things you can't change
zh.content-announcement-description: 您可以在这里收到心火计划最新的公告和新闻, 以及最新活动通知, 请您关注心火计划官网以获得一手信息!
zh.content-partner-description: 和我们心火计划合作的会在这里展示, 需要合作的请联系 (admin@hfpro.top) !

en.title: Heart Fire Project
en.content-welcome-hfp-welcome: Welcome to the official website of the Heart Fire Project!
en.content-introduce-main-hfp-joinus-2: I'm waiting for your arrival at Heart Fire Project!
en.content-introduce-right-hfp-what-is-hfp: What is the Heart Fire Project?
en.content-introduce-right-hfp-what-is-hfp-: The Heart Fire Project is a passionate community of Minecraft players. Our mission is to make every Minecraft world understood and enjoyed by the majority of players through translation and sharing.
en.content-introduce-right-hfp-cross-lang-g: Breaking through language barriers, sharing the world.

Our team is dedicated to translating Minecraft maps. We are committed to enabling more players to understand the stories and environments of these worlds, making language no longer a barrier to exploring new realms
en.content-introduce-right-hfp-create-excel: Creating and sharing high-quality Minecraft experiences.

In the Heartfire Project, we firmly believe that innovation and creativity drive us forward. We encourage every member to infuse their imagination into the world of Minecraft, creating unique maps that allow every player to experience different adventures.
en.content-admin-group-members: Members of the Heart Fire Project
en.content-admin-group-members-siyaofang-1: One of the main founders of the project
en.content-admin-group-members-siyaofang-2: Roser says she likes to exploit other members

en.content-statistics-members-beiyao-2: He doesn't know what to write

en.content-statistics-members-siyaofang-2: Se doesn't know what to write
en.content-statistics-members-hepingge-1: One of the members of the Heart Fire Project
en.content-statistics-members-hepingge-2: Young people should aspire to soar high, not letting down the prime of life nor you.

en.content-statistics-members-heimnad-2: Let go of things you can't change

en.content-statistics-members-?-2: He doesn't know what to write
en.content-announcement-description: You can receive the latest announcements and news from the Heart Fire Project here, as well as notifications of the latest activities. Please pay attention to the official website of the Heart Fire Project to get firsthand information!
en.content-partner-description: Those who cooperate with our Heart Fire Project will be showcased here. If you need to cooperate, please contact (admin@hfpro.top)!
